REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0323 reute u f BC-TENNECO-<TGT>-TO-REDE 03-04 0047

TEXT.TITLE: TENNECO <TGT> TO REDEEM 11 DLR PREFERRED
TEXT.BODY: Tenneco Inc said it will redeem all of its outstanding 11.00 dlr cumulative preference stock on April eight at 102.24 dlrs a share including accrued dividends. It said 2,515,400 shares of the stock will be redeemed. Reuter
